title: Nedbank Affinity Cup
text: The Nedbank Affinity Cup was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Sunshine%20Tour">Sunshine Tour</a>. It was founded in 2007 as a precursor to the <a href="Nedbank%20Golf%20Challenge">Nedbank Golf Challenge</a>, and is played at the <a href="Gary%20Player">Gary Player</a> designed <a href="Lost%20City%20Golf%20Course">Lost City Golf Course</a>, in <a href="Sun%20City%2C%20North%20West">Sun City, North West</a>, <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>.
